text.__SUMMARY__: Garcinia gardneriana, the bacupari, is an evergreen, dioecious species of the genus Garcinia. It is distributed throughout South America's Amazon Basin and produces fruit with edible arils.  In Brazil there is currently research to use this fruit to combat cancer.
text.Synonyms:
Garcinia brasiliensis var. parvifolia Mart.
Garcinia gardneriana (Planch. & Triana) Zappi
Rheedia brasiliensis (Mart.) Planch. & Triana
Rheedia gardneriana Planch. & Triana
Rheedia spruceana Engl.
